::Darkfate::

One of Darkfate's snakes's head turned and said with Darkfate's voice 
to Scorponok "Hold on, it will be fast"

Darkfate took off and used his comm link said to all his troops "To 
all my troops, Follow Drilbit and Killfest signal... I'll see you 
there."

"Killfest, Drilbit" said Darkfate used his comm link "I'm on the way 
to your position, what's the situatiuon there?? "


"Now, Scorponok" said one of snake's head to Scorponok "I guess that 
you have some questions to do, feel free to ask me while Other 
Predacons answer my comm link."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Scorponok climbs up hesitantly, and looks around trying to think 
with all
> that has happened recently. Everything has changed so much. "Yeah" 
he
> replied "brief me sir"
